name: scroll_area
docstring: Custom styled, cross-browser scrollable area using native functionality.

properties.name: scrollbars
properties.docstring: The alignment of the scroll area

properties.name: type
properties.docstring: Describes the nature of scrollbar visibility, similar to how the scrollbar preferences in MacOS control visibility of native scrollbars. "auto" | "always" | "scroll" | "hover"

properties.name: scroll_hide_delay
properties.docstring: If type is set to either "scroll" or "hover", this prop determines the length of time, in milliseconds, before the scrollbars are hidden after the user stops interacting with scrollbars.
